content: There are two Luojia Fragrant Vines to find in the Flaming Mountains. Don't forget to also check back in with the Monkey to purchase another one.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Luojia_Fragrant_Vine_Locations.md", within the section "Luojia Fragrant Vine Locations" and the sub-section "Flaming Mountains Luojia Fragrant Vines". The content is presented below:

There are two Luojia Fragrant Vines to find in the Flaming Mountains. Don't forget to also check back in with the Monkey to purchase another one.
